page.title: 06BMX bike riding.
page.content: Many of the boys in our area have had BMX bikes as birthday or christmas presents.These are special strong bikes which can be used for doing tricks.I can do "wheelies",which is riding on the back wheel with the front wheel in the air,and a"bunny hop" this is when first one wheel is lifted off the ground followed quickly by the other wheel.BMX bikes are great but not everyone thinks so! a few days ago our school had a visit from our local policeman pc Flynn.He came to warn us of the dangers of doing tricks on the roads and pavements.Luckily this might stop soon because a BMX track is being built on our estate(the Gurnos). There are competitions for BMX riders in the leisure centre and famous riders give demonstations.The sport is really popular throughout Merthyr.
